message.body: I'm sick as a dog, but will see you tonight to perform, best to move our meeting til after new years. What eve this week isms good for you?
Awe dang, thursday would work. I wish you a swift recovery!

Thanks! I think that can work for me too. I am finding myself pretty attached to the electric chair song, but really want to hear your thoughts and music. just sent out an email to the others about a meeting, maybe we can piggyback into that one?
Auditions on the 20th first rehearsal on the 27th, sent you all several emails just now, gettin in gear! We need to have show dates and venue by the audition!!!
